scripts.build-tsquery:prepare-analyse: npx browserify node_modules/@phenomnomnominal/tsquery/dist/src/index.js -s tsquery --debug | exorcist output/tsquery.js.map > output/tsquery.js
scripts.build-tsquery:prod: npm run build-tsquery && npx google-closure-compiler --warning_level=QUIET --js=output/tsquery.js --js_output_file=output/tsquery.min.js && mv output/tsquery.min.js output/tsquery.js
scripts.build-java-ast:prod: npm run build-java-ast && uglifyjs output/javaast.js -o output/javaast.js -c
scripts.build-vue-compiler:prod: npm run build-vue-compiler && uglifyjs output/vue-template-compiler.js -o output/vue-template-compiler.js -c
scripts.postbuild-codemirror: npx google-closure-compiler --warning_level=QUIET --js=output/codemirror.js --js_output_file=output/codemirror.min.js && mv output/codemirror.min.js output/codemirror.js && npx uglifyjs output/codemirror.js --output output/codemirror.js
